Title: Silverlight Guitar Chord Calculator
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight guitar chord calculator


This is the source code for the Silverlight Chord Calculator. The article is published at Simple-Talk.com and written by John Papa. THe demonstration for this application can be found at http://johnpapa.net/demos/chordcalc/demo.html

Feel free to download the source and suggest modifications. The code or parts thereof can be used as you wish as long as attribution to the original author is made.
